security_audit.summary: Official skill from a trusted source. Minimal audit performed as requested. No security issues detected in the scanned files.

content.user_title: Design a bold frontend interface fast
content.value_statement: Many interfaces look generic and forgettable. This skill guides you to build distinctive, production-grade designs with clear aesthetic direction.
actual_capabilities: Guides users to define purpose, tone, and constraints before coding
Emphasizes distinctive typography choices and font pairing
Promotes cohesive color themes using CSS variables
Encourages intentional motion and staggered reveals
Pushes for bold spatial composition and atmospheric backgrounds
limitations: Does not provide backend logic or APIs
Requires clear user requirements for best results
Does not include licensed font or image assets
Focuses on frontend aesthetics over data modeling

use_cases.title: Create a hero landing page
use_cases.description: Define a memorable aesthetic for a new product landing page with strong typography and motion.

use_cases.title: Build a branded component set
use_cases.description: Generate cohesive UI components that match a chosen visual direction and avoid generic layouts.

use_cases.title: Prototype a marketing microsite
use_cases.description: Create a distinctive single page that stands out in investor and customer demos.

prompt_templates.title: Starter layout
prompt_templates.scenario: You need a simple but distinctive page
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a single page portfolio with a bold minimal aesthetic, unique typography, and a subtle load animation. Use HTML and CSS.

prompt_templates.title: Brand tone
prompt_templates.scenario: You want a clear visual direction
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a homepage for a sustainable fashion brand with an organic, refined tone. Specify fonts, colors, and layout choices.

prompt_templates.title: Component focus
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a set of three CTA card components with asymmetry, strong color contrast, and hover motion. Provide clean HTML and CSS.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced motion
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a magazine style landing page with staggered reveals, layered backgrounds, and a striking hero section. Use CSS animations.

output_examples.input: Design a retro-futuristic landing page for a music app with bold typography and strong contrast.
output: Retro neon palette with a deep navy base and electric cyan accents
Display font for headlines paired with a refined mono body font
Asymmetric hero layout with diagonal dividers and layered glow shapes
Staggered load animation for headline, subtext, and call to action
Textured gradient background with subtle grain overlay

best_practices: State the desired tone and target audience before requesting code
Ask for specific fonts and color variables to keep the design cohesive
Request a clear motion plan with one high impact animation
anti_patterns: Asking for a generic modern UI without a clear aesthetic direction
Accepting default system fonts and flat single color backgrounds
Adding random micro animations without a visual purpose

faq.question: Is this compatible with my frontend stack?
faq.answer: It supports common HTML, CSS, and framework outputs when you specify your stack.

faq.question: Are there limits on design complexity?
faq.answer: The output matches your request, but complex visuals may require more code and assets.

faq.question: Can it integrate with existing design systems?
faq.answer: Yes, provide your system tokens and constraints for consistent results.

faq.question: Does it handle data or user privacy?
faq.answer: No, it focuses on frontend visuals and does not process user data.

faq.question: What if the result looks too generic?
faq.answer: Specify a bold tone, unique typography, and distinct layout constraints.

faq.question: How does it compare to generic UI generators?
faq.answer: It prioritizes intentional aesthetics and avoids common template patterns.
